name: BackRomii
description:
Hello, welcome to creepy BackRomii.

This game is a Kronii's fame game with the Back room concept.

You, Kronii need to run away from Mumei.

Expected playtime: 10~20 mins

Key setup

WASD: Move

L-shift: Run

ESC: Toggle mouse/ Skip cutscene

[Update news]
